metadata.title: Google Cloud Digital Leader CDL Practice Questions

2.name: Innovating with Data and Google Cloud

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Digital Transformation with Google Cloud (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Google Cloud Adoption Framework is a key concept in Digital Transformation with Google Cloud. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Cloud Digital Leader exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with explain the benefits of cloud technology to a business. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any digital transformation with google cloud task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Digital Transformation with Google Cloud is most closely related to differentiate between cloud deployment models (iaas, paas, saas)?
options: Digital Transformation with Google Cloud governance and oversight
Digital Transformation with Google Cloud implementation and operations
Digital Transformation with Google Cloud assessment and testing
Digital Transformation with Google Cloud risk management
questions.explanation: Differentiate between cloud deployment models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS) falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Digital Transformation with Google Cloud.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Digital Transformation with Google Cloud (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Cloud Migration Strategies (6 Rs) is a key concept in Digital Transformation with Google Cloud. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Cloud Digital Leader exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Innovating with Data and Google Cloud (Domain 2)?
options: Vision AI, Natural Language AI, Speech-to-Text
questions.explanation: Responsible AI Principles is a key concept in Innovating with Data and Google Cloud. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Cloud Digital Leader exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with identify google cloud data management solutions. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any innovating with data and google cloud task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Innovating with Data and Google Cloud is most closely related to identify google cloud smart analytics solutions?
options: Innovating with Data and Google Cloud governance and oversight
Innovating with Data and Google Cloud implementation and operations
Innovating with Data and Google Cloud assessment and testing
Innovating with Data and Google Cloud risk management
questions.explanation: Identify Google Cloud smart analytics solutions falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Innovating with Data and Google Cloud.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Innovating with Data and Google Cloud (Domain 2)?
questions.explanation: Vertex AI Platform is a key concept in Innovating with Data and Google Cloud. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Cloud Digital Leader exam.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Infrastructure and Application Modernization (Domain 3)?
questions.explanation: Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) is a key concept in Infrastructure and Application Modernization. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Cloud Digital Leader exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with differentiate between google cloud compute options. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any infrastructure and application modernization task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Infrastructure and Application Modernization is most closely related to discuss google cloud networking and security?
options: Infrastructure and Application Modernization governance and oversight
Infrastructure and Application Modernization implementation and operations
Infrastructure and Application Modernization assessment and testing
Infrastructure and Application Modernization risk management
questions.explanation: Discuss Google Cloud networking and security falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Infrastructure and Application Modernization.

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Infrastructure and Application Modernization (Domain 3)?
questions.explanation: VPC Networks and Firewall Rules is a key concept in Infrastructure and Application Modernization. This domain covers topics essential for the Google Cloud Digital Leader exam.
